— Neural Networks for Time Series Processing , 1996.
More speciﬁcally, neural networks can be conﬁgured to support an arbitrary deﬁned but
ﬁxed number of inputs and outputs in the mapping function. This means that neural networks
can directly support:
 Multivariate Inputs. An arbitrary number of input features can be speciﬁed, providing
direct support for multivariate forecasting.
